TopicTitle: Sokobond: a puzzle game about chemistry; for non-chemists.

Articles.Content:
Here is a link:

http://www.sokobond.com

Not quite the same gameplay, but most definitely in the same vein: http://watomic.sourceforge.net/ . You also don't have to pay 8 dollars, and it seems that the mazes are much more complex than the ones in sokobond. It's been a go-to for me for longer than I can remember.

Edited July 22, 2014 by Flymetothemun
